title: Financial 'jackpot' unlikely for cash-strapped St. Peter's Peacocks despite generating NCAA tournament revenue - ESPN
content: Financial 'jackpot' unlikely for cash-strapped St. Peter's Peacocks despite generating NCAA tournament revenue  ESPN
description: The Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference stands to make more than $8 million from St. Peter's NCAA tournament run, but MAAC Commissioner Rich Ensor doesn't expect a 'jackpot' for the Peacocks.
